mapper.select: select rno, nid, ncategory, ntitle, ndate from(select rownum rno, nid, ncategory, ntitle, to_char(ndate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ndate from(select nid, ncategory, ntitle, ndate from dmu_notice order by ndate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select nid, ncategory, ntitle, ncontent, ndate from dmu_notice where nid = #{nid}
mapper.update: update dmu_notice set ncategory=#{ncategory}, ntitle=#{ntitle}, ncontent=#{ncontent} where nid=#{nid}
